nodes.text: R5-L26 was an R5-series astromech droid during the Clone Wars.

R5-L26 was present during General Grievous's assault on Adi Gallia's flagship. While the crew was evacuating, R5-L26 was running around, but then bumped into R2-D2 who was escaping along with C-3PO aboard a Y-wing starfighter.
Despite R5-L26 being confirmed as an R5 unit, the droid's frame is actually an R4-series, which establishes a continuity error.
